$ZIM dividend max predicted the latest dividend was going to be 1.50 and it was 2.95 they were off by double.
The Q4 dividend will be weird because we have no idea what these pyromaniacs will do. Anywhere from $1.50 to $10 depending on how much extra they want to pay as a bonus.
I am more concerned about the Q 1 dividend of 2023. Analysts are predicting earning will crater into the ground or disappear completely.
I think thats wrong.
Estimated earnings of $1.
My estimate is $5 to $8
People will be floored and go "BUT THE SPOT PRICE??? BUT THE SPOT PRICE???"
I am watching history repeat boys. SPOT price don't mean shit when you enter into long term contracts.

Thats how the oil industry survived in Canada. But the low prices drove out all the little guys so now we have 4 major companies controlling all the market share and the spot price is for the drilling rig plebs  that don't have access to pipeline contracts.
